import React from 'react'; import './fonts.css'; import {Header, ItemHeader, TextHeader, OptionsProductsApple, ItemOptionsProductApple} from './AppStyled' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import {faApple} from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import {faMagnifyingGlass, faBagShopping} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import iMac from './assets/images/iMac.svg'; function App() { return (
Loja Mac iPad iPhone Watch AirPods TV e Casa Só na Apple Acessórios Suporte
); } export default App;
